pages.text: $(li) The Soul Bread is an item that you can use to find the nearest $(l:patchouli:structures/fortress)Nether Fortress$(/l).$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are holding this item in your hand and it will fly into the direction of that structure.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/quark/wraith)Wraiths$(/l) may drop this item on death.
